title: Court adjourns Toshakhana-II case till Oct 14
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 13 (APP): A special court on Monday adjourned hearing till October 14, in toshakhana-II case against PTI founder and his wife Bushra Bibi.
Special Judge Central Sharukh Arjumand heard the case at Judicial Complex Islamabad. The court was to hear the arguments of prosecution in this hearing but it was adjourned till next date.
Earlier, the hearing scheduled at Central Jail Adiala was cancelled and it was conducted in judicial complex.
